tools/edgeStats.c File Reference

Detailed Description

Report edge length statistics on a dataset.

Source
/home/Repositories/fcdmf/fclib/tools/edgeStats.c,v
Revision
1.22
Date
2006/11/07 23:49:03

Description: Usage: edgeStats [options] dataset [mesh_name]

Reports edge length statistics. If a mesh is given, it reports the stats for only that mesh, otherwise it reports stats for all meshes.

Todo:
?Add a flag to get overall average of edges?
Modifications:
  • 04/20/04 WSK, created.

00280

00296      }
00297

00299      if (foundDispls[i] + foundSeqDispls[i] == 0) {
00300        printf("    (Displacement var not found, cannot calc edge lengths)\n");
00301        fflush(NULL);
00302      }
